name: CMMotionActivityManager
desc: An object that manages access to the motion data stored by the device.

items.name: class func isActivityAvailable() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean indicating whether motion data is available on the current device.

items.name: class func authorizationStatus() -> CMAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: Returns a value indicating whether the app is authorized to retrieve stored motion data.

items.name: enum CMAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: The authorization status for motion-related features.

items.name: func startActivityUpdates(to: OperationQueue, withHandler: CMMotionActivityHandler)
items.desc: Starts the delivery of current motion data updates to your app.

items.name: func stopActivityUpdates()
items.desc: Stops the delivery of motion updates to your app

items.name: typealias CMMotionActivityHandler
items.desc: A block that reports the current motion associated with the device.

items.name: func queryActivityStarting(from: Date, to: Date, to: OperationQueue, withHandler: CMMotionActivityQueryHandler)
items.desc: Gathers and returns historical motion data for the specified time period

items.name: typealias CMMotionActivityQueryHandler
items.desc: A block that reports the motion updates that occurred between the specified query interval.
